title: Monitor & CPU Power Issues
description: Troubleshooting power and display issues for desktop systems.

steps.title: Cable & Switch Check
steps.instruction: Check power cables for monitor and CPU. Ensure power switches are ON.

steps.title: Socket & Cable Swap
steps.instruction: Try a different power socket. Try a known working power cable if available (do not use damaged cables).

steps.title: Reset
steps.instruction: Restart both the monitor and CPU.

steps.title: Raise Ticket
steps.instruction: If no power, raise a ticket with: Asset ID, issue description, and steps you already tried.
